column5: I think ya got a bad link there bubba!
That was close dawg. I almost opened it.LOL J/K
Maybe it was this.  That is mad stalking skilz.

WOW!  that is crazy --- and funny   I suppose you wouldn't have much choice but to just sit there and remain calm, seeing as she had her calf with her...could it not be a dangerous situation if she felt threatened?
man!! how fast must his heart have been racing!! awsome vid!
Guess he only had a bull tag..... lol
You are absolutely right ... not sure what happened ... thanks Doug !
I cound'nt imagine what he must of been feeling,  I'm still shaking from just watching it    Great video!
And they say tracking moose is difficult. Just sit there with a bow, they come to you!
